thread.title: ‘The White Helmets’ wins best documentary short subject - The Washington Post
thread.title_full: ‘The White Helmets’ wins best documentary short subject - The Washington Post

title: ‘The White Helmets’ wins best documentary short subject - The Washington Post
text:
‘The White Helmets’ wins best documentary short subject 
Orlando von Einsiedel and Joanna Natasegara accepted the award. The movie follows a group of people who helps victims in war-torn Syria. Director & producer of "The White Helmets," short doc about Syria's volunteer rescue force: Orlando von Einsiedel & Joanna Natasegara. pic.twitter.com/JbNWlEuVW9 Share via Email The inside track on Washington politics.
